issue.title: url param tracking: add $removeparam=_branch_referrer
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

in urls such as `https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/ngzh/episodes/Verschrnkung--Plastik--Parasiten-e23ae4m?%24web_only=true&_branch_match_id=...&_branch_referrer=...` the param `_branch_referrer` will not be removed, yet.
but it should be removed.

### Proposed solution

add

`$removeparam=_branch_referrer`

to TrackParamFilter/sections/general_url.txt

and remove
```
click_id=*_branch_referrer=$removeparam
```
in the same file (because it will be redundant) as well as the lines
```
||tumblr.com^$removeparam=_branch_referrer
||open.spotify.com^$removeparam=_branch_referrer
||reddit.com^$removeparam=_branch_referrer
```
in TrackParamFilter/sections/specific.txt.

furthermore line
```
||blog.twitch.tv^$removeparam=/web_only|_branch_referrer/
```
could be reduced to
```
||blog.twitch.tv^$removeparam=web_only
```


### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body:
Checking quickly, `teltarif.de##+js(remove-node-text, script, /getAdUnitPath|\.then\(eval\)|DisplayAcceptableAdIfAdblocked|\,eval\)\)\)\;/)` and `teltarif.de##+js(no-setTimeout-if, null), 10)` in uBlock Filters Ads seems to work on Chrome on my end, especially as uBlock Origin is listed in the config as being one of *3* adblockers used at the same time.

I can only presume AdGuard Filters can copy the 2 entries as they see fit.

@Alex-302 , теперь точно уверен, что у них есть антиотладка. Вчера опять появились баннеры, правда, судя по всему, кинуло в другую A/B группу, т.к. появлялись они исключительно при переключении видео в плейлисте, при чем (что важно) каждый раз. В общем, опять открыл консоль, и... баннеры исчесзли и уже сутки их нет.
Есть ли возможность, удаленно подключиться по AnyDesk и подебажиться по Wireshark, когда они опять появятся?
